topic.title: The next popular Zerosite
topic.body:
Why is [Millchan](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/) the most popular website among many Zerosites?

Can its success be replicated?

1549977746_1E8jBAziTnrJcoWWSG2D15t7JdxhT.body:
> [leftside](#comment_590_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): Regarding the density of its recent posts, I don't think it's something successful...

I think the number of peers is the measure of success.

1548974921_18S47ArorYtHtcicjdGi6VZdhgJgw.body:
@mcdev

I want to translate all the pages of the Millchan Engine into Chinese. How can I do it.?
